about_the_game:
Some parts of the game includes flashy colors and colorful explosions.
If you have epilepsy, please do not play this game! This is a serious warning.

Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew!



21xx. Mankind is extinct. Now, there is worse.
You're Lumi, a punk catboy and you're looking to save your sister Lunta.
While you're at it, could you please free the town from the Viper dictatorship?



Warcat Parade, that's a bullet hell heavily inspired by Touhou project, developed by Team Shanghai Alice. I am a solo developer as well. Since this is my first game, I didn't want to make something overscoped but I wanted to do it well! Therefore, all you will see, even in the demo version, has been crafted by hand with love, from pixel art to chiptune music! That's my love letter to video games.



What is Warcat Parade?

  • 6 challenging levels! (Just 1 in the demo version)
  • 6 fearful bosses! (Just 1 in the demo version)
  • Catboy.
  • 2 game styles!
  • 3 difficulty settings!
  • Hand-crafted pixel art! No AI!
  • Hand-crafted chiptune music! Still no AI!
  • No "make your own danmaku" plugin were used! Apart from the Unity Engine, everything has been coded from the ground!
  • Go pew pew pew in a futuristic Nîmes (that's my native town, eh)!
  • Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew.

Nyan!
Hefka Games

short_description: Catboy in a bullet hell! Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew!
